Oi,

Nice work on the game! I had a lot of fun playing around with it, but I
can see how it could become a real time-thief ;) Did you come up with any
new cool features for NEAT in the process?

The comments on /. were very favourable also, which was nice also. 

I noticed that your site suffered the slashdot effect - it went belly up
from the intense load, but that's a common occurance.

with regards,
mattias
